description: Designed and developed the Jio Associate Verification System, a secure platform for field associate validation using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
Integrated OTP-based authentication, JWT authorization, and AES-256 encryption ensuring compliance with GDPR and enterprise security standards.
Collaborated with Flutter frontend and backend teams to establish modular architecture.
Documented full-stack architecture and CI/CD workflow to ensure scalability and maintainability.
